Recon sets his sights on Aerotaur and grins. "You bet your skid plate I'm 
back again. Except now I am a transmetal 2! My pitiful body was destroyed in 
a great battle, but my immortal spark survived. And now I have taken this 
new body, I hope you're ready to be destroyed aerotaur, because the so 
called, religious looney in back again," Recon tells him, he then charges at 
top speed right for his enemy.

>Primus, are you back again?"
